author: Robert Gearty
title: Virginia pastor dies from coronavirus after vowing to keep church open despite essential business order - Fox News
description: Virginia pastor dies from coronavirus after vowing to keep church open despite essential business order Fox News Bishop Gerald Glenn, pastor from Virginia, dies of coronavirus CBS News Bishop who preached 'God is larger than this dreaded virus' dies of COVID-…
content:

The coronavirus has killed a prominent Virginia pastor who told his congregation at a service in March, “I firmly believe that God is larger than this dreaded virus.… [+1850 chars]
